assessments.status_rationale: No item in today’s bullets indicates Congress has attempted or succeeded in overriding either of the referenced 2025-12 infrastructure/water-project vetoes; the deadline (2026-04-30) has not passed.

Today’s news notes Venezuela freed dozens of political prisoners, but the bullet list does not clearly state that any released person was a U.S. citizen detained in 2025 and publicly identified as such, nor that the release followed a publicly acknowledged diplomatic engagement as defined in the prediction.
No bullet indicates the UK announced a Russia-related sanctions package adding 50+ oil tankers/vessels by name/IMO; the deadline (2026-03-31) has not passed.

There is no mention in today’s bullets of a BIS Entity List action adding 5+ China/Hong Kong entities explicitly citing Nvidia GPU smuggling/diversion or advanced-computing export-control evasion; the deadline (2026-06-30) has not passed.
No bullet references a PBOC cut to the RRR or key policy rates; the deadline (2026-03-31) has not passed.
No bullet references CME raising initial margins for COMEX gold or silver by at least 10% in a single change; the deadline (2026-03-31) has not passed.

No bullet indicates a venture-backed European alternative-protein company (non-insect) with ≥$100M disclosed funding entering formal insolvency/administration; the deadline (2026-12-31) has not passed.

No bullet indicates the Netherlands issued a formal order blocking or unwinding a China-linked acquisition/investment in a Dutch semiconductor or semiconductor-equipment company; the deadline (2026-12-31) has not passed.
